div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 349px; height: 1px; padding-top: 151px; margin-left: 686px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica", "VP Default"; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; word-break: break-word; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
RM queries the reputation repository for the following
1. If the entity already exists directly, get the
reputation score
2. If the entity exists, but as a transitively
trusted entity use this reputation score and
calculate the new reputation based
on the formula
3. If it doesn't exist, calculate the score and store it

textPath.tspan: RM queries the reputation repository for the following
1. If the entity already exists directly, get the
reputation score
2. If the entity exists, but as a transitively
trusted entity use this reputation score and
calculate the new reputation based
on the formula
3. If it doesn't exist, calculate the score and store it

1. If the entity already exists directly, get the
reputation score
2. If the entity exists, but as a transitively
trusted entity use this reputation score and
calculate the new reputation based
on the formula
3. If it doesn't exist, calculate the score and store it

1. If the entity already exists directly, get the
reputation score
2. If the entity exists, but as a transitively
trusted entity use this reputation score and
calculate the new reputation based
on the formula
3. If it doesn't exist, calculate the score and store it

3. If it doesn't exist, calculate the score and store it

1. If the entity already exists directly, get the
reputation score
2. If the entity exists, but as a transitively
trusted entity use this reputation score and
calculate the new reputation based

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 388px; height: 1px; padding-top: 151px; margin-left: 1100px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica", "VP Default"; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; word-break: break-word; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.div:
Now, the Reputation-based policy repository is queries.
Even if the entity is authorized based on the policies, the final authorization will depend on the reputation.
A previously-authorized entity (for accessing a document
for e.g.), will now be denied access due to reputation drop i.e.
the entity cannot be trusted with this document anymore

textPath.tspan: Now, the Reputation-based policy repository is queries.
Even if the entity is authorized based on the policies, the final authorization will depend on the reputation.
A previously-authorized entity (for accessing a document
for e.g.), will now be denied access due to reputation drop i.e.
the entity cannot be trusted with this document anymore
Now, the Reputation-based policy repository is queries.
Even if the entity is authorized based on the policies, the final authorization will depend on the reputation.
A previously-authorized entity (for accessing a document
for e.g.), will now be denied access due to reputation drop i.e.
the entity cannot be trusted with this document anymore

Even if the entity is authorized based on the policies, the final authorization will depend on the reputation.
A previously-authorized entity (for accessing a document
for e.g.), will now be denied access due to reputation drop i.e.
the entity cannot be trusted with this document anymore

Even if the entity is authorized based on the policies, the final authorization will depend on the reputation.
A previously-authorized entity (for accessing a document
for e.g.), will now be denied access due to reputation drop i.e.
the entity cannot be trusted with this document anymore

Even if the entity is authorized based on the policies, the final authorization will depend on the reputation.
A previously-authorized entity (for accessing a document
for e.g.), will now be denied access due to reputation drop i.e.
the entity cannot be trusted with this document anymore
